name: De Lewante Restaurant
review: Delightfully friendly, cosy and informal. The food here is not to be missed! The dishes are Middle Eastern/Eastern Mediterranean, including several options I’ve not seen elsewhere in Potsdam. It’s all very delicious and home-made fare. The place seems great for bringing friends to as there is something for everyone (including many vegetarian and vegan options). Also, it’s very reasonably priced. Looking forward to visiting again very soon!

name: Kades Restaurant "Am Pfingstberg"
review: Really beautiful place. Great service, good food with some tiny bit of space for improvement in regard to the price they charge. Great restaurant nonetheless...

name: Ristorante & Trattoria "Al Dente"
review: Nice food at a decent price, my sister and I really like it here. Individuals who work here are extremely wonderful and generally helpful especially to my sis that has food allergies. An excellent range of food on the menu, always has loads of meals to select from and new meals added by the chefs all the time. It was busy whenever we arrived for dinner but we did not have to wait around long for our table. Splendid place to go for dinner, would undoubtedly highly recommend.

name: LOKAL Potsdam
review: A place for healthy breakfast options that you can cherrypick from the menu. I have been there a couple of times and everything is delicious and fresh. Also they’ve got one of the best coffee in Potsdam, and they offer WiFi which means you could take a nice cosy corner for study in ambient atmosphere. The staff is really friendly, and honestly helpful. Highly recommend

name: Restaurant Laila
review: Great authentic food, we had the mixed platter that had limited options. Mainly veg and a little varied choice. Service was a little slow to start but then got everything we needed. Very satisfied but a little pricey. Best to reserve if get the option as fills up quickly.

name: A Slice of Britain
review: Owned by an English man and his wife. She produced amazing food completely fresh which we enjoyed immensely. The products available were some great English traditionals like pg tips, marmite, nerds, Yorkshire tea, ales, scones and most important, clotted cream. Lovely little place.

name: Piccolo Pane
review: I fell in love with this place on the first sight and the dishes there totally met up with my expectations. The atmosphere is so friendly an the bartender/waiter is so super cool guy with the perfect sense of humor and great hospitality. Would definitely go there again 😊

name: Assaggi
review: This restaurant is exceptional and a clear example of getting what you pay for. I was absolutely thrilled with the freshness, quality and bold flavours of the dishes I sampled (see photos). Service was genuine, hospitable and very friendly. The only downside to my experience was that the restaurant appeared understaffed which meant we had to wait to be attended to after finishing our mains. However, this was insignificant in comparison to the truly excellent meal I enjoyed.

name: Belmundo kauf- und essbar
review:
Nice decorated, cosy and well kept place. Very good customer service.
At Belmundo you can have a lovely meal (including some vegan options) or just a drink. In addition you can buy artwork from independent local artist.

name: mike's Heimatküche
review:
Mike's Heimatküche ist ein super gemütliches Lokal mit hochklassigem Essen. Ich hatte den Ziegenkäse, die Maultaschen und Mallorcanischen Kuchen. Alle diese Gerichte waren super zubereitet und geschmackstechnisch sehr hochwertig! Uns hat der Inhaber bekocht und seine Frau bedient, d.h. der Service war super. Sogar für Fahrer oder alkoholfreie Freunde gibt es den "Tee-secco" als Essensbegleitung.
Ich komme sehr gerne wieder, hat super geschmeckt!
